text: Nandao nimen zhong youren xiwang ziji you yige ye zao shu he putao shu de yuanpu, zhu he cong yuan zhongliuguo, ta jingchang shouhuo ge zhong shuiguo, dang ta nianmai er zisun shang you ruo shi, yizhen dai huo de xuanfeng qinxi ta, shi ta shaohui ma? An la ruci wei nimen chanming xuduo jixiang, yibian nimen shensi [zhu].
